SENT.plain: The management of cardiovascular emergencies is a fundamental component of the practice of an emergency practitioner
Delays in the evaluations and management can lead to significant morbidity or mortality
It is of vital importance to be familiar with procedures such as pericardiocentesis, cardioversion, defibrillation, temporary pacing, and options for the management of tachyarrhythmias

This article discusses the most common cardiovascular procedures encountered in an emergency setting, including the indications, contraindications, equipment, technique, and complications for each procedure
